clickhouse_dataset module¶

class clickhouse_dataset.ClickHouseDataset(credentials: Dict[str, Any], table_name: str, partitioned_column: str, if_exist: str = 'drop')[source]¶

Bases: AbstractDataSet[DataFrame, DataFrame]

clickhouse_dataset.cast_datatype_for_clickhouse(ddf: DataFrame)[source]¶
clickhouse_dataset.get_info(ddf: DataFrame)[source]¶

Initialise a DsmDataNode with parameter from data catalog.

Parameters:

ddf (pd.DataFrame) – Dictionary of credentials variable. It must be contain dsm token in key ‘token’. You can define it in local/credentials.yml

Raises:

Exception – When parameters are incorrectly

Returns:

A new DsmDataNode object.
